Name: Time Splatter
About the game: What is Time Splatter? Time splatter is a small episodic rail shooter game where our protagonist, after touching an ancient monolith, is transported to the times where the black plague transformed people into zombie like creatures and knights protected the land. In the first chapter, our protagonist warps into a dungeon where plagued individuals where confined until their demise, will he be able to survive? Follow our protagonist in his way to blast everything in the past... in his path to return home. FEATURES Blast live and undead enemies that stand in your way. Use your trusty weapons to face the opposition. Enjoy an episodic adventure that increases the game content which each installment. Steam achievements. Steam leaderboards.
